data.lyric:
[ti:OTW (BURNS Version)]
[ar:Khalid / 6LACK / Ty Dolla $ign]
[al:OTW (BURNS Version) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.50]OTW (BURNS Version) - Khalid/6LACK/Ty Dolla $ign
[00:01.27]Lyricist：Khalid Robinson/Paul Jefferies/Idan Kalai/Brian Alexander Morgan/Tyrone Griffin Jr./Ricardo Valentine
[00:01.76]Composer：Khalid Robinson/Paul Jefferies/Idan Kalai/Brian Alexander Morgan/Tyrone Griffin Jr./Ricardo Valentine
[00:02.92]Khalid：
[00:14.82]Yeah yeah yeah
[00:17.18]This the type of sh*t that you been waiting all year for
[00:20.92]Back in town for a minute if you with it
[00:24.13]Got a lot of time I just need somewhere to spend it
[00:27.61]I just press a button and the top go missing
[00:31.51]I kept the slip so you know it's not rented yeah oh oh
[00:36.61]What you wanna do
[00:38.29]Worried 'bout your friends they saw you this afternoon
[00:41.54]I been reading your mind
[00:44.87]No fair but you gotta let me know
[00:48.36]I'm all ears and I got a lot of room in my whip
[00:52.90]If you wanna take it there I'm on my way
[00:57.26]Put it in drive I'll be outside I'll be on the way
[01:02.50]I'll be on the way
[01:03.59]You can meet me in five I'll be all night I'll be all day
[01:09.55]I'll be all day
[01:11.40]Put it in drive I'll be outside I'll be on the way
[01:16.83]I'll be on the way
[01:18.11]You can meet me in five I'll be all night I'll be all day
[01:23.86]I'll be all day
[01:24.87]Ty Dolla $ign：
[01:25.63]Drop top the Porsche put that b**ch in sport
[01:28.08]Out here in the field oh yeah yeah I'm already here yeah
[01:32.63]Come outside looking like a snack hurry up get in hell yeah yeah
[01:37.86]Come with me on this mission
[01:40.25]Riding down the coast ooh I want that for sure ooh
[01:43.91]You say play Khalid
[01:45.60]I say pass the weed
[01:47.22]Pull up to the crib oh said you've never been before
[01:50.75]Put you in Provocateur girl I made you mi amor
[01:55.16]You said you left your ex that dude was always gassin'
[01:58.70]You said before me you ain't never been this happy
[02:02.25]You took an L with him and winning ever since ever since
[02:05.86]You hit my phone I'm on my way I cancel plans
[02:08.16]Khalid：
[02:08.36]Put it in drive I'll be outside I'll be on the way
[02:13.64]I'll be on the way
[02:14.68]You can meet me in five I'll be all night I'll be all day
[02:20.47]I'll be all day
[02:22.45]Put it in drive I'll be outside I'll be on the way
[02:27.83]I'll be on the way
[02:29.00]You can meet me in five I'll be all night I'll be all day
[02:34.88]I'll be all day
[02:35.89]6LACK：
[02:37.43]You tryna make a move
[02:39.06]Tonight I got the time tell me what you wanna do
[02:43.33]Call the squad if you wanna rendezvous
[02:45.84]They gon' push up on they own I only got room for two
[02:50.45]From the 'jects on the set it's a Porsche not a 'Vette
[02:53.92]I confess I'ma flex till they show some respect
[02:57.52]Get away so we can make sense of your life
[03:00.77]You was in park but I just put your sh*t in drive
[03:04.26]Now coast like there's no tomorrow
[03:08.65]Moving too fast I'm open to drive slow
[03:12.20]I don't want you to wonder where I go
[03:15.57]Can learn a lot from this and that's something that I know
[03:19.11]Khalid：
[03:19.34]Put it in drive I'll be outside I'll be on the way
[03:24.80]I'll be on the way
[03:26.02]You can meet me in five I'll be all night I'll be all day
[03:31.83]I'll be all day
[03:33.54]Put it in drive I'll be outside I'll be on the way
[03:38.99]I'll be on the way
[03:40.18]You can meet me in five I'll be all night I'll be all day
[03:46.07]I'll be all day
data.trans:
[ti:OTW (BURNS Version)]
[ar:Khalid / 6LACK / Ty Dolla $ign]
[al:OTW (BURNS Version) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.50]//
[00:01.27]//
[00:01.76]//
[00:02.92]//
[00:14.82]//
[00:17.18]这是你耗尽一年的等待
[00:20.92]如果你带着它回镇上一分钟
[00:24.13]我只需要在某个地方度过一段时间
[00:27.61]按一下按钮 它的上面就会不见
[00:31.51]保留着它 让你知道它不是租的
[00:36.61]你想要做什么
[00:38.29]担心那些下午见过你的朋友们
[00:41.54]我可以看穿你的一切想法
[00:44.87]这是不公平的 但是你要让我知道
[00:48.36]我有很多时间 我会洗耳恭听
[00:52.90]如果你想带走它 我就会离开
[00:57.26]开着车 我就在外面 我会一直在路上
[01:02.50]我会一直在路上 随时为你待命
[01:03.59]如果你需要我 你会在五分钟之内见到我 我会一直在路上
[01:09.55]我会一直在路上 随时为你待命
[01:11.40]开着车 我就在外面 我会一直在路上
[01:16.83]我会一直在路上 随时为你待命
[01:18.11]如果你需要我 你会在五分钟之内见到我 我会一直在路上
[01:23.86]我会一直在路上 随时为你待命
[01:24.87]//
[01:25.63]发动敞篷车 让它带我离开这里
[01:28.08]离开这里 到空旷的原野上去 我已经做好准备
[01:32.63]到外面的花花世界中去 快点下地狱去吧
[01:37.86]跟我一起执行这个任务
[01:40.25]沿着那海岸 我确切地想知道
[01:43.91]你说要扮演哈立德
[01:45.60]我为你加油鼓励
[01:47.22]不再深受束缚 你说你从未去过
[01:50.75]你是一个惹事精 但你是我的爱人 宝贝 让你更需要我
[01:55.16]你说 那个离开你的前任总是很暴躁
[01:58.70]你说 在我面前你从未这么快乐过
[02:02.25]你说 自从跟我在一起 你感觉自己像个赢家
[02:05.86]你给我打电话时 我在路上 我已经有一些计划
[02:08.16]//
[02:08.36]开着车 我就在外面 我会一直在路上
[02:13.64]我会一直在路上 随时为你待命
[02:14.68]如果你需要我 你会在五分钟之内见到我 我会一直在路上
[02:20.47]我会一直在路上 随时为你待命
[02:22.45]开着车 我就在外面 我会一直在路上
[02:27.83]我会一直在路上 随时为你待命
[02:29.00]如果你需要我 你会在五分钟之内见到我 我会一直在路上
[02:34.88]我会一直在路上 随时为你待命
[02:35.89]//
[02:37.43]你今晚有安排吗 
[02:39.06]我有时间陪你 告诉我你想做什么
[02:43.33]如果你想约会 就打电话给我
[02:45.84]他们都不在 只有我们两个人的空间
[02:50.45]从布景上看 这是保时捷而不是通风口
[02:53.92]我承认我很灵活 但是为了表示尊重
[02:57.52]保持距离 我们才能更好地了解你的生活
[03:00.77]公园里 我只想让你开车
[03:04.26]现在 海岸好像还看不到明天
[03:08.65]时光飞逝 我只希望开得慢一点
[03:12.20]我不想让你好奇我去哪儿
[03:15.57]但我可以从中学到很多东西 我知道的
[03:19.11]//
[03:19.34]开着车 我就在外面 我会一直在路上
[03:24.80]我会一直在路上 随时为你待命
[03:26.02]如果你需要我 你会在五分钟之内见到我 我会一直在路上
[03:31.83]我会一直在路上 随时为你待命
[03:33.54]开着车 我就在外面 我会一直在路上
[03:38.99]我会一直在路上 随时为你待命
[03:40.18]如果你需要我 你会在五分钟之内见到我 我会一直在路上
[03:46.07]我会一直在路上 随时为你待命
